charges.charge_description: MARIJUANA - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE - defendant, aided and abetted by others, did possess with intent to distribute a quantity of marijuana in violationof Title 21, USC 841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(D) and Title 18, USC 2(1)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the BOP for 4 months. Sentence imposed to run consecutive to sentence imposed in 4:09-CR-235/
